law.catch_line: The Board of Trustees shall treat a member's credit for unused sick leave as creditable service on o...
law.text:
The Board of Trustees shall treat a member's credit for unused sick leave as creditable service on or after July 1, 1998, if at the time of retirement, the member is:
subject to the contributory pension benefit or the Alternate Contributory Pension Selection; and
entitled to service credit for unused sick leave under § 20-206 of this article.
